channel.title: Compilier issue
channel.description:
my compilier is giving an error
[code] The system cannot find the path specified [/code]
I right clicked and edited my compilier.bat file Code inside below: [Code] @echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause [/code]
I looked for... C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe and i have all the files up to javac.exe it didnt come with my java that I downloaded yesterday so can i get a direct like to the file please or a different java compiler will work to as long as it works :) TYVM IN ADVANCE!

item.title: Compilier issue
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

my compilier is giving an error

 The system cannot find the path specified

I right clicked and edited my compilier.bat file
Code inside below:

@echo off
Title Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" *.java
pause
